name: Unstable FLESH
description:
your flesh is willing, whether you like it or not...

collect 3 keys and escape the decrepit building, lest you join the collection of bloody pulp and festering tissue

CONTROLS

  • Use the arrow keys to move
  • Use the up arrow to jump
  • Move into ledges to grab onto them
  • Jump while doing a turning around to perform a high backflip

Made for LUDUM DARE 49 - Unstable
